name: rathena-intl
description: This project intends to translate rAthena NPC texts in many languages.

scripts.preinstall: rm -rf tmp && mkdir -p dist && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/rathena/rathena.git tmp
scripts.test: NPC_DIRECTORY='tests/' yarn start && diff tests/output.xliff dist/npc.xliff
